item.title: How to Write a Codelab
item.description: What youâ€™ll Learn How to create steps How to include code snippets How to include links and images Call to Action What you’ll need Any required application or library Access to a Sandbox Each step should be contained with { {< step >}} template string like below. You can give title for each step with the label attribute, and the estimated duration can be specified in duration attribute as well.
